name: XANARTHRAXIA
detailed_description:
Stalwart knight, align yourself for battle! Synchronize the energetic patterns within XANARTHRAXIA's ancient glyphs in this bite-sized casually competitive RPG clicker. String together attack combos by correctly matching given shapes before the enemy has a chance to react. Resist endless waves of increasingly difficult procedural enemy types by slowing time with your special charge attack. Deposit your loot into the Steam Leaderboards. Heal yourself by clearing every single tile on the battlefield, and get as far as you possibly can before succumbing to the pressure that is XANARTHAXIA.



  • Retro Pixel Art
  • One Button Gameplay
  • Infinite Replayability
  • Steam Leaderboards
  • 5 'Actually Achievable' Achievements
  • Custom Chip Tune Soundtrack
  • Integrated Indie Dev Support
